|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Add-on Security Camera *1080p HD, Wire-Free *Audio, Rechargeable *Indoor/Outdoor, Night Vision *Works with Amazon Alexa (AVS) {{FCC ST|03/13/2018|indexme.}} {{See also|List of Camera Devices}}
